projects.title: My Portfolio website
projects.bodyText:
- Portfolio Website made in **React**.
 -  **Docorized** the application, build the image using NGNIX server and pushed the image to **dockerHub registery**.
 - Deployed the app on **Kubernetes** multi-node cluster.
 - Set up the **CI/CD** pipeline on **Jenkins** which updates the dockerhub registery on every pull request after running tests on **sonarQube**.

projects.title: Brothers BarberShop - FYP
projects.bodyText:
- Led a team of 8 members in developing a **ExpressJs** & **VueJS** based full-stack appointment scheduling webapp.
 - Added User authentication using **JWT**, **Multer** for picture manipulation and password reset using **SendGrid**.
 - Used **PostgreSQL** for database and **POSTMAN** for API testing. 
 - Used **MVC** as an architectural design pattern and **agile methodology** for project delivery. 
 - Used Docker for containerizing the application and leveraged SonarQube for running automated tests.

projects.title: Book For You Recommender - Big Data
projects.bodyText:
- .Built, and evaluated a Content-based and Collaborative recommender system with K-means and ALS algorithms.
 - Leveraged big data framework Apache Spark and Python to develop the recommenders.
 - Processed of 2.66 GB to train and evaluated the modelâ€™s using accuracy, precision, recall, F1-measure and RMSE.

projects.title: AI Mask Detector using CNN
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an AI mask detector project to identify different types of masks using CNN supervised classification.
 - Leveraged machine learning frameworks i.e. **Pytorch**, **sklearn** and **python** to built the mask detector.
 - Achieved 79% accuracy, F1 score, recall, and 83% precision after removing racial bias from the dataset.
